name: Ocean Eyes tumblr
description:
Tumblr dashboard theme using the inside album artwork of Owl City: Ocean Eyes. Works in Firefox and Chrome. #OCTMS
Follow me at http://glacier-coast.tumblr.com for updates and more themes! :)
additional_info:
Requested by http://ilenah-xenios.tumblr.com/

7/17/14: Fixed post column transparency
11/1/14: New tumblr header compatibility
1/8/15: Removed bg color for icon scrolling
